name: Sarah's Corporation
text: Please scroll through the technology areas listed below for Sarah's corporation, and use the form at the bottom to suggest any early-stage companies in your network that might be a good fit. If you have any questions, contact David Machajewski at dmachajewski@istcoalition.org. If you think Sarah's corporation is cool, let us know.

areas: Kettle corn with high sugar content
Colored popcorn that you can get at a fair
Coconut oil infused popcorn made with artisinal ingredients
Stovepop popcorn with cumin, mustard powder, and fennel powder
Apple and berry flavors (but no raspberry flavor)
Perrier or La Croix, as long as it is grapefruit (pampelmousse)
Polar springs in a plastic bottle (not in a can)
